_header: Sovereigns and sirs if it be your wille
Subjects: Anne, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of St. Anne — 460 lines in quatrains

BodTan407.First Lines:
SOuereynys and serys ȝyf it be ȝour wylleTo here and to
                    lere of thyng that is good …
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…And god saue vs alle þat al thyng may saueAnd bryng vs
                    to þe blys þat lestyth with owtyn ende

BLHar4012.First Lines:
SOueraines & frendis if hit be your willTo here and to lere a
                    þinge þat is good…
BLHar4012.Last Lines:
…God saue vs all þat all þinge may haue &
                    saueAnd bringe vs to his blis þat lastiþe withoute
                    ende
BLHar4012.Editions:
Parker,  Roscoe E.,
                        ed.  
             The Middle English Stanzaic Versions of the Life of St. Anne.
EETS
         o.s. 174 (1928); repr. 1987: 110-26.
